name: Open City Car Driving Mission
description:
Time to become the real hero in the open world city. The open city is the real action thrilling game for all the lovers of the grand crime theft mafia game. Come and enjoy the city of sin with different challenges to face as the real city car driving hero. You are put on multiple missions lately. Enter into the world of freedom and play different modes of the real city rescue hero mission. Start your journey as the real crime rescue hero and start missions against the crime lord. Stop the rescue war and street robbery now. Show your driving skills as well as the shooting skills to be the real hero in the ultimate open city driving rescue mission game.

Time to take the revenge in the open city shooting mission. Play this grand shooting attack. You are on the heist shooting war in the city life. Experience the best open world life that you have not been experienced before. Snatch and steal cars from the citizens in the free mode for the survival mission so that you will be able to save your friend! Complete the missions in the endless mode in which you can shoot as wander around the grand city freely. Add some adventure in the driving car shooting city. Use the grand helicopter to save the citizens from the real gang war.

FEATURES
• 4 thrilling grand mafia modes in the open world
• Drive, shooting, free mode or challenge mode
• 10 exciting levels in the challenge mode
• Time limit to complete the grand car driving rescue missions
• Engaging gameplay sound effects
• 3 real hero selection for the open world missions
